upgrade.description: - Translate word with google when select a word (available in Android 3.0 or later) - Repeat mode: repeat all, repeat one - Download description automaticlly if you have mp3 only Notes: 1. Mp3 files must be in directory of media 2. File name of mp3 must follow the rules, such as: ESL Podcast 975 – Making Food from Scratch.mp3, ESLPod975.mp3, English Café 438.mp3, EC437.mp3 - Bug fix and performance optimize
